name: unnerve

effect.sword_shield: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.
effect.legends_arceus: Opposing Pokémon cannot eat held Berries while this Pokémon is in battle. Affected Pokémon can still use bug bite or pluck to eat a target's Berry.

short_effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Unnerves opposing Pokémon and makes them unable to eat Berries.
